text:
#MarketingManager #web3

Position: Marketing Manager
Company: GAGARIN
Salary: $1500 - $3000
Location: Remote
Employment Type: Full-time
Contacts: @polina_aksakova

The international web3 marketing agency Gagarin is looking for an experienced marketing manager with excellent understanding of the cryptocurrency industry and experience in this field.

About the Agency:

Gagarin Agency is a web3 marketing agency that specializes in developing and implementing go-to-market strategies for projects. We have successfully launched over 75 projects. Among our clients are Wirex, Tectum, Eldarun, and CredeFi. 
Learn more about us here: Gagarin Agency


Responsibilities:

- Develop and implement robust marketing strategies for Web3 projects.
- Manage advertising campaigns with a focus on optimization and ROI.
- Handle content and communications across various platforms like social media and blogs.
- Analyze market trends and competitors to enhance marketing tactics.
- Engage with clients to align marketing efforts with their objectives.

Requirements:

- At least 2 years of experience in crypto marketing.
- Proficient in using Web3 tools, KOLs marketing, ADS, and various campaign strategies.
- Strong analytical and communication skills; teamwork-oriented.
- Fluent English (B2 level minimum).
- Fluent  Russian: (B2 level minimum)

Benefits:

- Competitive salary and opportunities for professional growth.
- Vibrant and innovative working environment.

If you are interested or know someone who might be the right fit, please don't hesitate to reach out for more details or send your resume directly!


--

#SMM #socialmediamanager #web3


Position: Social Media Manager (SMM)
Company: GAGARIN
Salary: $700 - $1400
Location: Remote
Employment Type: Full-time
Contacts: @polina_aksakova

The international web3 marketing agency Gagarin is looking for an experienced SMM specialist with excellent understanding of the cryptocurrency industry and experience in this field.

About the Company:

We are an international cryptocurrency project ranked among the top 5 on crypto rankings. Our launchpad brings together over 12,000 investors. Additionally, we are a Web3 marketing agency that develops and implements go-to-market strategies for startup projects. Our clients include renowned companies such as Wirex, Tectum, Eldarun, and CredeFi.

Responsibilities:

- Developing and implementing a social media promotion strategy for the company.
- Creating content plans for social media (Twitter, Discord, Telegram, Medium, LinkedIn).
- Regular posting and maintaining activity on the mentioned social networks.
- Analyzing market conditions, competitors, and target audience.
- Organizing and conducting AMA sessions and promotional events.
- Evaluating the effectiveness of marketing activities using analytical tools.

Requirements:

- Solid understanding of the fundamentals of marketing and project promotion principles in the crypto market.
- Experience with web3 projects for at least 6 months.
- Ability to work with analytical tools.
- Experience managing social media (Twitter, Discord, Telegram) and creating engaging content.
- Fluent English (B2 level minimum).
- Fluent  Russian: (B2 level minimum)


Benefits:

- Competitive salary and opportunities for professional growth.
- Vibrant and innovative working environment.

If you are interested or know someone who might be the right fit, please don't hesitate to reach out for more details or send your resume directly!

--
[< –ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—à–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª ¬´–†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ –ò–¢¬ª >]

#KOLs #web3

Position: KOLs- manager
Company: GAGARIN
Salary: $700 - $1400
Location: Remote
Employment Type: Full-time
Contacts: @polina_aksakova

The international web3 marketing agency Gagarin is looking for an experienced KOLs- manager with excellent understanding of the cryptocurrency industry and experience in this field.

About the Agency:

Gagarin Agency is a web3 marketing agency that specializes in developing and implementing go-to-market strategies for projects. We have successfully launched over 75 projects. Among our clients are Wirex, Tectum, Eldarun, and CredeFi. 
Learn more about us here: Gagarin Agency

Responsibilities:

- Onboarding KOL aggregators.
- Accounting for KOLs and KOL aggregators by region.
- Maintaining communication with KOL aggregators in chats.
- Collecting applications for participation in KOL rounds of projects.
- Communicating with the project to finalize the deal on selling the KOL round.
- Directing proposals for participation and promotion of fundraising rounds on the launchpad.
- Creating and maintaining a communication channel between KOL aggregators and the project for controlling posting according to the terms of the KOL round.
- Proposing forms of interaction with KOLs and creating new services involving the Gagarin KOL network.


Requirements:

- Understanding of the roles and tasks of influencers in Web3.
- Understanding of the processes in the crypto industry.
- English language proficiency at level B1.
- Fluent  Russian: (B2 level minimum)
- Ability to use chat GPT.
- Understanding the attractiveness of the project for investments.
- Ability to use Web3 data aggregators.

Benefits:

- Competitive salary and opportunities for professional growth.
- Vibrant and innovative working environment.

If you are interested or know someone who might be the right fit, please don't hesitate to reach out for more details or send your resume directly!


--
[< –ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—à–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª ¬´–†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ –ò–¢¬ª >]

#SMM #Marketing #web3


Position: Head of marketing
Company: GAGARIN
Salary: $2000 - $4000
Location: Remote
Employment Type: Full-time
Contacts: @polina_aksakova

The international web3 marketing agency Gagarin is looking for an experienced Head of marketing with excellent understanding of the cryptocurrency industry and experience in this field.

About the Company:

We are an international cryptocurrency project ranked among the top 5 on crypto rankings. Our launchpad brings together over 12,000 investors. Additionally, we are a Web3 marketing agency that develops and implements go-to-market strategies for startup projects. Our clients include renowned companies such as Wirex, Tectum, Eldarun, and CredeFi.

Responsibilities
- Drive investor traffic to the platform.
- Foster the development of the Gagarin brand in both B2C and B2B markets.
- Manage community engagement: develop and implement retention programs, including managing chat admins.
- Devise and implement strategies for token growth.
- Design improvement programs for the platform and coordinate with the technical team for their implementation.

Requirements:

- At least 1 years of experience in crypto marketing.
- Proficient in using Web3 tools, KOLs marketing, ADS, and various campaign strategies.
- Strong analytical and communication skills; teamwork-oriented.
- Ability to work with analytics services and interpret metrics;
- The ability to anticipate and forecast business trends based on accumulated experience;
- Fluent English (B2 level minimum).
- Fluent  Russian: (B2 level minimum)

Benefits:

- Competitive salary and opportunities for professional growth.
- Vibrant and innovative working environment.

If you are interested or know someone who might be the right fit, please don't hesitate to reach out for more details or send your resume directly!

--

‚Ä¢  –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ–≥–æ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞ Spring/Spring Boot

‚Ä¢  –û–ø—ã—Ç –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–¥-—Ä–µ–≤—å—é

‚úçÔ∏è –í –æ–±–º–µ–Ω –Ω–∞ –≤–∞—à –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∏ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –º—ã —Ö–æ—Ç–∏–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏—Ç—å:

‚Ä¢  –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –∫–æ–Ω–∫—É—Ä–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã, —É–ª—É—á—à–∞—Ç—å –∏—Ö –∏ –≤–ª–∏—è—Ç—å –Ω–∞ –∫–æ–Ω–µ—á–Ω—ã–π —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç
‚Ä¢  –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –ª—é–±—ã–º –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–º —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–æ–º (–¢–ö, –ò–ü, –°–∞–º–æ–∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å, –ì–ü–•)
‚Ä¢  –ü–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –æ—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—É—é –∑–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç—É, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—É—é –º—ã —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä—É–µ–º, –æ—Ç—Ç–∞–ª–∫–∏–≤–∞—è—Å—å –æ—Ç –≤–∞—à–∏—Ö –ø–æ–∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–π
‚Ä¢  –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è, 40 —á–∞—Å–æ–≤–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª—è

#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #job #vacancy #—Ä–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è #–≥–∏–±—Ä–∏–¥ #english #PHP #Junior #germany 

üü£Junior PHP developer
üîπCompany: Devhunt
üîπLocation: Munich, Germany  (relocation) 
Employment - Full-time
Format ‚Äì On site
Salary - 50.000 ‚Äì 60.000 euro brutto per year
üîπAbout the company: International e-commerce company in Munich. We specialize in the development of solutions for our online shops.

üîπSkills:
1-2 years of experience working with PHP, MySQL
English: Advanced (B2/C1)
üîπNice to have:
experience with APIs, Unit testing
German language

üîπResponsibilities:
Building and supporting high-load systems
Development of complex web solutions
Communication with colleagues in English

üîπWe offer
Exciting work in a fast-growing company. Responsibility, creative freedom, learning new technologies, communication with international colleagues.
Flexible work schedule
Home office is possible up to 2 days a week
Language courses
Team building activities & office lunches
Career opportunities
Support for relocation

üìß Contact me: @aljenat

[< –ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—à–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª ¬´–†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ –ò–¢¬ª >]

Junior Customer Support Specialist (Casino)

Focused on the Indian market, we are a global iGaming (Online Casino / Betting) company looking for a dedicated Customer Support Specialist.¬†
Are you someone who thrives on delivering top-notch service? Ready to drive in?

You‚Äôll be doing:¬†
- Responding to player queries pronto, whether it's through live chat or email.
- Building trust and satisfaction by handling interactions with professionalism.
- Keeping an eye on what our players are saying and suggesting ways we can make things even better.
- Making sure different teams are on the same page so we can tackle issues efficiently.
- Being the champion of positive player experiences and overall happiness.

What we need from you:¬†
- Fluent in English (C1) and either Russian or Hindi as your native language.
- Killer communication skills - you know how to talk the talk and write like a pro.
- Sharp problem-solving abilities to tackle any challenge head-on.
- Excited to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment.
